message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $15,000. I believe it will be incredibly valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to be within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I'm aiming for a higher price, I'm willing to negotiate. How about $13,000?
I'm still a bit above my budget with $13,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $11,000. Can you consider that?
